title: Wood Floor Coverings
content:
A bit off the beaten path, but that’s what this Forum Section is all about, correct?

My wife and I just had wood floors installed in our house. Up until recently, we had been receiving a catalog dedicated to area rugs. Well, since we didn’t have wood floors to cover, I paid it no real attention. Now that we have wood floors, I can’t seem to remember the name of the catalog and can’t help but wonder if I’ll ever receive one in the mail again.

I was wondering if any of you out there know of any good source(s) for designerly area rugs?

MT

 [‹ Typeface classification](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023162048/http:/www.typophile.com/node/9757 "Go to previous forum topic") [The difference between Helvetica and Neue Helvetica ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023162048/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37072 "Go to next forum topic")
author: umlautthoni

comments.content: You might be interested in [FLOR](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023162048/http:/www.flor.com/?src=google&camp=b_brand&ad=2c&gclid=CLHVwuOFhY8CFQSOggod63Tv3g). A modern take on what an area rug can be.
Thank you very much, Miss Tiffany. The first catalog arrived yesterday. My wife also thanks you.
